gov.usgs.traveltime

Class TTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.traveltime.TTime

  • public class TTime
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains complete information (including auxiliary information) for all phases generated by a source at the desired depth and source receiver-distance.
    Author:
    Ray Buland

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TTime(double depth, double delta)
      The constructor just creates an ArrayList to hold the phase data.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TTime

        public TTime(double depth,
             double delta)
        The constructor just creates an ArrayList to hold the phase data. The depth and source-receiver distance are remembered for convenience.
        Parameters:
        depth - Source depth in kilometers
        delta - Source-receiver distance in degrees

    • Method Detail

      • addPhase

        public void addPhase(java.lang.String phCode,
                     double tt,
                     double dTdD,
                     double dTdZ,
                     double dXdP,
                     boolean corrTt)
        Add basic travel time information for one phase.
        Parameters:
        phCode - Phase code
        tt - Travel time
        dTdD - Derivative of time with respect to distance
        dTdZ - Derivative of time with respect to depth
        dXdP - Derivative of distance with respect to ray
        corrTt - True if the travel-time itself needs to be modified by the statistical bias parameter

      • addStats

        public void addStats(double spread,
                     double observ)
        Add phase statistical parameters.
        Parameters:
        spread - Statistical spread
        observ - Relative statistical observability

      • addFlags

        public void addFlags(java.lang.String phGroup,
                     java.lang.String auxGroup,
                     boolean isRegional,
                     boolean isDepth,
                     boolean canUse,
                     boolean dis)
        Add phase flags.
        Parameters:
        phGroup - Base phase group
        auxGroup - Auxiliary phase group
        isRegional - True if this is a regional phase
        isDepth - True if this is a depth phase
        canUse - True if this phase can be used in an earthquake location
        dis - True if this phase should be down weighted during phase identification

      • finish

        public void finish(boolean tectonic,
                   boolean noBackBrn)
        Finalize the suite of travel times by sorting and filtering them.
        Parameters:
        tectonic - If true convert Pb and Sb into Pg and Sg
        noBackBrn - If true eliminate all back branches

      • size

        public int size()
        Provide a way of getting the number of phases found.
        Returns:
        The number of phases in the list.

      • get

        public TTimeData get(int i)
        Provide a way of getting the data for each phase by index.
        Parameters:
        i - Phase index
        Returns:
        Travel-time structure

      • remove

        public void remove(int i)
        Provide a way of removing an unwanted phase by index.
        Parameters:
        i - Phase index

      • print

        public void print()
        Print the travel-time data for all phases as a table.
